bellow.translation[0].definitions[0].def: to shout loudly in a deep voice
bellow.translation[0].definitions[1].def: to make the deep sound that a bull makes
bellow.translation[1].definitions[0].exa: His voice rose to a bellow.
Alex gave another bellow of laughter.
bellow.translation[1].definitions[1].def: the deep sound that a bull makes
